title: (x) Whitechapel identity - custom typeface {Lisbeth (self)}
content:
I'll venture a guess that this isn't a font because it is pixel-perfect. I find it doubtful that any existing non pixel-perfect font would render so precisely at this size. It's equally doubtful that anyone would produce a bitmap font at this scale ergo it's probably not a font.   
   
It's very cool though.
author: typotect

comments.content: Quite possible they had a custom font created.
